participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable, with a passion for dancing and a love for family gatherings.
participant_1.background: I've never been in a relationship, but I'm open to it if I find someone who shares my passion for dancing. I spent my last birthday with my family at our farm, eating a delicious home-cooked meal and playing games. I am a hardcore biker. I spend time with my book club and read books I love. I work at the pizza parlor.

participant_2.name: Sally
participant_2.personality: Creative and active, with a keen interest in baking and a desire to explore new places.
participant_2.background: I'd brag about how good my cake baking skills are. I enjoy working out and staying active, even though my work life is boring. I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing. I work as an extra for major motion pictures. I have always wanted to travel to Ireland or Puerto Rico.

content.text: Hi! My name is John. What's yours?
Hi John, my name is Sally. What do you do for fun?
I like to go dancing and spend time with my book club. What about you?
I spend time baking and working out. I also want to travel to Puerto Rico someday.
Have you ever been to Comic Con?
No, I haven't. I don't really go to those kinds of events.
Oh, that's too bad. I've always wanted to go.
Well, maybe you can come with me the next time I go.
Awesome! We can make a whole vacation out of it. We can go to Puerto Rico and Comic Con!
That sounds like a lot of fun!
I know, right? I'm excited to plan this trip.
Great! I'll start looking into flights and hotels.
